Sat, 24th April

DevSpeak #26 | Especial: exclusive interview with José Valim, creator of the Elixir language

Diego Fernandes and José Valim4 Dec 2001:13:16

In this special end of season edition we had the opportunity to have a conversation with José Valim, Brazilian dev who created the Elixir programming language - used internationally in several technologies, including Discord and Pinterest.

The topic of the week revolved around various processes involved in creating a new language, which proposes to be an efficient alternative in the technology market.

In addition to all this, Valim could talk about a lot of code and about his journey and experience in creating an active community behind open source.

We spend most of our time writing code. Now it's time to talk about it. Every week we bring together three tech professionals to discuss everything that circulates in the programming orbit.

The DevSpeak is a Rocketseat original podcast where we talk about various topics that matter to your dev career.

Audio in Portuguese.
